00020 #ifndef _RTAI_ASM_I386_ATOMIC_H
00021 #define _RTAI_ASM_I386_ATOMIC_H
00022 
00023 #include <linux/bitops.h>
00024 #include <asm/atomic.h>
00025 
00026 #ifdef __KERNEL__
00027 
00028 #include <asm/system.h>
00029 
00030 #define atomic_xchg(ptr,v)       xchg(ptr,v)
00031 #define atomic_cmpxchg(ptr,o,n)  cmpxchg(ptr,o,n)
00032 #define xnarch_memory_barrier()  smp_mb()
00033 
00034 #else /* !__KERNEL__ */
00035 
00036 struct __rtai_xchg_dummy { unsigned long a[100]; };
00037 #define __rtai_xg(x) ((struct __rtai_xchg_dummy *)(x))
00038 
00039 static inline unsigned long atomic_xchg (volatile void *ptr,
00040                                          unsigned long x)
00041 {
00042     __asm__ __volatile__(LOCK_PREFIX "xchgl %0,%1"
00043                          :"=r" (x)
00044                          :"m" (*__rtai_xg(ptr)), "0" (x)
00045                          :"memory");
00046     return x;
00047 }
00048 
00049 static inline unsigned long atomic_cmpxchg (volatile void *ptr,
00050                                             unsigned long o,
00051                                             unsigned long n)
00052 {
00053     unsigned long prev;
00054 
00055     __asm__ __volatile__(LOCK_PREFIX "cmpxchgl %1,%2"
00056                          : "=a"(prev)
00057                          : "q"(n), "m" (*__rtai_xg(ptr)), "0" (o)
00058                          : "memory");
00059 
00060     return prev;
00061 }
00062 
00063 #define xnarch_memory_barrier()  __asm__ __volatile__("": : :"memory")
00064 
00065 /* Depollute the namespace a bit. */
00066 #undef ADDR
00067 
00068 #endif /* __KERNEL__ */
00069 
00070 typedef atomic_t atomic_counter_t;
00071 typedef unsigned long atomic_flags_t;
00072 
00073 #define xnarch_atomic_set(pcounter,i)          atomic_set(pcounter,i)
00074 #define xnarch_atomic_get(pcounter)            atomic_read(pcounter)
00075 #define xnarch_atomic_inc(pcounter)            atomic_inc(pcounter)
00076 #define xnarch_atomic_dec(pcounter)            atomic_dec(pcounter)
00077 #define xnarch_atomic_inc_and_test(pcounter)   atomic_inc_and_test(pcounter)
00078 #define xnarch_atomic_dec_and_test(pcounter)   atomic_dec_and_test(pcounter)
00079 #define xnarch_atomic_set_mask(pflags,mask)    atomic_set_mask(mask,pflags)
00080 #define xnarch_atomic_clear_mask(pflags,mask)  atomic_clear_mask(mask,pflags)
00081 
00082 #define xnarch_atomic_xchg(ptr,x) atomic_xchg(ptr,x)
00083 
00084 #endif /* !_RTAI_ASM_I386_ATOMIC_H */
